participant_1.background:
I've kept my wife's terminal cancer a secret from my parents because I don't want them to worry.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
My cat is my most prized possession.
I take a deep breath and sing my favorite song in the shower.
i love to watch the voice.

participant_2.background:
I have a large family, and we love to go on adventures together.
I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening.
I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving.
i like to arm wrestle.
i married miss usa.

content.text: I'm doing well! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and go on adventures together. I also enjoy reading, gardening, and listening to music.
Those all sound like great ways to relax and de-stress. I love to watch The Voice, and I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
That sounds so cute! I love dogs too. I have a cat that is my most prized possession.
What's your favorite song to sing in the shower?
It's a toss-up between "Bohemian Rhapsody" and "Hallelujah."
Both great choices! I love to sing "Sweet Child o' Mine" when I'm in the car.
That's a classic! I'm not very good at singing, but I love to do it anyway.
I'm sure you're better than you think you are.
Thanks! I'm glad we're having this conversation.
Me too! It's been great getting to know you.
You too! I hope we can talk again soon.
